description: Miso is key this rich plant-based ramen, enriched with tahini for extra sesame flavour.
name: Miso Sesame Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, sliced, green tops reserved
5cm ginger, peeled and sliced into matchsticks
1L vegetable stock, made with 2 stock cubes, hot
4 heads bok choi, sliced in half lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pan on medium heat and cook the spring onions for 2 minutes, stir in the garlic, ginger, miso and soy sauce cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the stock and stir in the tahini. Bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 10 minutes, remove from the heat and use an immersion blender to blitz until smooth and slightly thick.
Bring the soup back to the boil, add the noodles and bok choi and cook for 7 minutes, until the noodles are tender.
Serve with carrot matchsticks and spring onion tops.
